title: Ghana greets the Queen

description: The vision and vigour of the Republic of Ghana provide backcloth to this account of the Royal tour in November 1961. Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II and HRH Prince Philip were welcomed in Accra, where an exciting regatta and an inspection of Ghana's armed forces and police were among engagements.
